materials.name: English Conversation Beginner Course
materials.about: This course is for those who want to be able to answer simple questions about familiar topics.

materials.name: English Conversation Intermediate Course
materials.about: This course is designed for people who want to be able to express their opinions and explain detailed situations about things that interest them.

materials.name: Callan Method
materials.about: This course uses the Callan Method, a popular learning method developed in England, to effectively learn English conversation four times faster than usual.

materials.name: Side by Side
materials.about: The popular teaching material 'Side by Side' is rich in illustrations, and is a course where even beginners can learn English while having fun.

materials.name: Kids course
materials.about: This course is mainly for children from preschool to around 12 years old. Recommended for adults who want to learn from the basics.

materials.name: The Biginner
materials.about: This course is for those who are learning English conversation for the first time, and those who want to be able to greet and introduce themselves in English.

materials.name: English conversation advanced course
materials.about: This course is designed for students who want to be able to express their opinions clearly and accurately on a wide range of topics.

materials.name: Business course
materials.about: This is a comprehensive course for learning business English in different business situations.

materials.name: Pronunciation practice course
materials.about: This course is aimed at those who want to acquire fluent pronunciation.

materials.name: Exam preparation course
materials.about: This course is to practice for your exam. We use our original materials, and you will be able to ready.
